column4: we'll just eat at the arena. We asked the hostess to validate the valet ticket
column5: since we hadn't eaten and had been misled
column6: and she was aghast - as if they should never have to do that. Enter the manager
column7: who graciously offered to seat us immediately at some of the available seats I mentioned earlier
column8: but at that point we were just out of time. They did validate the valet
